duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate patient care by assisting the surgeon before, during, and after surgical procedures.
Plan, set up, perform, and clean up the assigned surgical procedure as a circulator and as a scrub tech.
Demonstrate knowledge of and the ability to apply the Principles of Asepsis in creating and maintaining the sterile field.
Perform sharp, sponge, and instrument counts according to policy.

education_certification.credential: Certified Surgical Technologist - National Board of Surgical Technology and Surgical Assisting (NBSTSA)
